verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Dare to stand like Joshua
Dare to say the word

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
As for me and my house
We will serve the Lord
Verse 1
We are bound for Canaan land
Tenting by the way

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Who shall lead us on the road?
Choose your King today

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Many trials we have seen
Thus far on our way

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He hath led us safely through
Shall He lead today?

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
When the dark Red sea of doubt
Billowed in our way

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Then He parted ev'ry wave
So He will today

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Can we safely trust a guide
Who knows not the way?

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
God hath traveled ev'ry foot
He shall lead today

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Just before us Jordan rolls
Just across the way

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
We can safely trust the Lord
He shall lead today
